articles.description: The Michael Jordan basketball documentary has been a worldwide smash hit but any punters thinking Saturday’s Stradbroke Handicap will be “The Last Dance” for Kementari should think again.

articles.author: Alicia Newton
articles.title: NRL to investigate Bulldogs over COVID-19 protocols breach - NRL.COM
articles.description: The NRL will investigate handshakes between Canterbury Bulldogs club great Terry Lamb and players which appears to breach COVID-19 protocols, with Lamb now to be tested for the virus.
articles.content:
